l=[1, 3, 20, 143, 1442, 14377, 143071, 1418854, 14255667, 145674808, 1492609148, 15091199357, 149121303586, 1443278000870, 13770853279685, 130660965862333, 1245219117260664, 12024696404768025, 118226055080025491]

e = ['3 0', '7 3', '80 20', '857 143', '8558 1442', '85623 14377','771306 143071']

h=[3,7,80,857,8558,85623,856929,8581146,85744333,854325192,8507390852]

n=int(raw_input())
print str(h[n])+' '+str(l[n])
